name: Watcher's Nightmares
description:
A spot-the-difference horror game! (Inspired by I'm on Observation Duty)

Pick a location and start your night of anomaly seeking! The 3 locations have a spice of difficulty, but are easily manageable with enough practice. 

Controls are in the game. Just go to 'How to Play'.

NOTE: This game is unfinished, and will receive updates featuring new content and optimizations. Though it is still playable, don't worry about that.

To-do list: More locations, polishing, more content to existing locations.
